name: Nadja - Thaumogenesis
description: CD re-issue from Broken Spine Productions of Nadja's 2007 album. Comes in a cardboard digipack sleeve. Available digitally here.

name: Nadja - Bodycage
description: CD re-issue from Broken Spine Productions of Nadja's 2005 album. Comes in a cardboard digipack sleeve. Available digitally here.

name: Nadja + Vampillia - The Perfect World (LP)
description: A remastered, remixed, extra-tracked, and re-titled version of Nadja and Vampillia's collaborative album The Primitive World released on LP and CD by Important Records. Digitally available here and on CD here.

name: Nadja + Vampillia - The Perfect World
description: A remastered, remixed, extra-tracked, and re-titled version of Nadja and Vampillia's collaborative album The Primitive World released on LP and CD by Important Records. Digitally available here and on LP here.

name: Aidan Baker & Maik Erdas - Cameo (LP+CD)
description: An improvised guitar & drums sound journey through psychedelic, krautrock, ambient, drone and doom. 50 minutes of highly recommended experimental sounds, recorded in a church in Bochum, Germany, released by Midira Records. LP+CD package, limited to 250 copies. Available digitally here.

name: Nadja - Flipper (LP)
description: A limited LP-only release of stripped-down, minimal drone songs from Oaken Palace Records, featuring string contributions from Peter Broderick and Angela Chan. Available digitally here.

name: Adoran - S/T
description: Debut release from Adoran, a collaboration between Nadja's Aidan Baker (on drums) and Northumbria's Dorian Williamson (on bass). Released by Belgium's Consouling Sounds. Available digitally here

name: Aidan Baker - Already Drowning (LP)
description: An album of songs based on folk- and fairy-tales about female water spiritis, featuring the following guest vocalists: Clara Engel, Jessica Bailiff, Valérie Niederoest & Maude Oswald (from Toboggan), Joanna Kupnicka (from The Cold Hand), Geneviève Castrée (aka Ô Paon), Liz Hysen (from Picastro), and Carla Bozulich (from Evangelista, The Geraldine Fibbers). Available digitally here.

name: Nadja - Dagdrøm (LP)
description: Nadja's first full-length album in over two years, featuring live drums courtesy of Mac McNeilly from The Jesus Lizard. CD edition available here. Please note, the green vinyl pre-order edition is sold out! Download the album here.

name: Nadja - Dagdrøm
description: Nadja's first full-length album in over two years, featuring live drums courtesy of Mac McNeilly from The Jesus Lizard. Vinyl edition available here. Download the album here.

name: Aidan Baker - Aneira
description: An album of minimal, slow-evolving ambient music created with 12-string acoustic guitar for the Italian label Glacial Movements and their sonic aesthetic of icy, glacial sounds. Available digitally here.

name: B/B/S/ - Brick Mask (LP) + Half Moon (7")
description: A package deal of B/B/S/'s debut LP and 7" "Brick Mask" and "Half Moon". Available digitally here.

name: Nadja - Excision (2CD)
description: Essential collection of previously vinyl only Nadja tracks which work brilliantly as a 2 CD album. Available digitally here. All of these tracks originally appeared on limited vinyl or cd releases between 2007 and 2009 and are now out of print. Jornada del Muerto originally appeared on the Trinity cd (Die Stadt Musik) and Perichoresis on the Trinitarian lp (Important Records), both of which releases featured solo tracks by Aidan and Leah and one Nadja track. Spahn appeared on Tümpisa (Accident Prone Records), a split lp with the American band 5/5/2000, and Kriplyana (Melted & Refrozen Snow That Looks Blue In Early Morning) appeared on the Magma To Ice cd (Fario Records), a split with the Italian artist Netherworld. The two remixes of Automsomal were released on the LP version of Bodycage (Equation Records) and Kitsune (Fox Drone) appeared on a split cd/lp (Denovali Records) with the German band Kodiak. Clinging To The Edge Of The Sky (Vendetta/Adagio830 Records) was released as a single-sided 12".

name: Aidan Baker - Still Life
description: An album which entirely eschews the guitar...just piano, drums, and electric bass in a minimalistic, ambient, jazz way...available digitally here.

name: Aidan Baker - Souvenirs Of The Eternal Present (Cass)
description: A cassette tape release of shoegazery, electro-krautrock. Limited to 100 copies. Available digitally here. Available in the US direct from Anthem Records.

name: Nadja - Corrasion
description: 2012 re-issue of Corrasion in a digipack sleeve from Miskatonic Soundlabs. Available digitally here.

name: Aidan Baker & Troum - Nihtes Niht
description: A collaborative recording between Aidan Baker & Troum. Minimal, brooding, dark ambient recording live March 2011 at GHUTTO-M studios in Bremen, Germany. Released on CD by Alone At Last, packaged in a custom fold-out sleeve, including 11 full colour inlay cards. Available digitally here.

name: Aidan Baker w/ Richard Baker - Smudging (LP)
description: A LP of experimental/drone/spacerock with live drums courtesy of Richard Baker (also of ARC) released by the Italian label Backwards Records. Available digitally here.

name: Aidan Baker - Origins & Evolutions
description: An album of four compositions for multiple guitars, with contributions from (besides Aidan) the following guitarists: Jon Attwood (aka Yellow6), Mick Barr (of Orthrelm, Krallice, etc.), Bryan W. Bray (of Gates, Gardenia, etc.), David Daniell (of San Agustin), Jonathan Demers, Richard Graham (aka Signals Under Tests), N, JF Sebastian (aka Orange Swan), David Tagg, Vampillia, Matej Voglar, Brian Wenckebach (of Elika), Nigel Wright. Available in North America from Install Sound or digitally here.

name: Nadja - Thaumogenesis (2LP)
description: 2LP vinyl edition of Thaumogenesis from Important Records. Includes a remix by James Plotkin and a bonus live cd. Artwork by Seldon Hunt.

name: Nadja & Picastro - Fool, Redeemer (LP)
description: A semi-collaborative split release with Picastro, side A featuring 4 tracks from Picastro, side B a side-long Nadja track... Comes with a download code, but if you just want the album digitally, you can get it here. CD version available from Alien8 Recordings.

name: Aidan Baker - The Spectrum Of Distraction (2CD)
description: A 2CD album released by Robotic Empire designed to be played on random and featuring contributions from these 18 drummers (alphabetical by last name): Aidan Baker (Nadja, ARC, Whisper Room, Infinite Light Ltd.), Richard Baker (ARC, Cymbl), Victor Cirone, Andrew Crawshaw (The Silent Ones), Alessandro Curvaia (Shora), Bruno Dorella (OvO, Ronin), David Dunnett (Man Meets Bear, Ça Va Mal), Thor Harris (Swans, The Angels of Light, Shearwater), Steven Hess (Panamerican, Locrian, Ural Umbo, Cleared, Haptic), Kevin Micka (Animal Hospital, Neptune), Mac McNeilly (The Jesus Lizard), Ted Parsons (Swans, Prong, Foetus, Godflesh, Jesu, Killing Joke, Treponem Pal, Teledubgnosis, Necessary, Wordsound Projects), Phil Petrocelli (Great Falls, Jesu, Black Noise Cannon, nov23, The Living Jarboe), Simon Scott (Slowdive), Geoff Summers (Batillus), Jakob Thiesen (Nadja, Whisper Room, Students), Brandon Miguel Valdivia (Picastro, Not the Wind Not the Flag, I Have Eaten the City), H. Walker (Kerretta, Avotor, Mean). Available digitally here (on the official release date of January 17, 2012). Please note, the cd comes with an exclusive download card for the complete sessions (almost 6 hours of music). Artwork by Matt Smith.

name: Nadja & OvO - The Life & Death Of A Wasp
description: A collaborative album with Italy's OvO recorded at Einsteurzende Neubauten's studio in Berlin...four tracks of weird drone-dub-doom... Available digitally here.

name: Aidan Baker - The Shape of Snakes (Book)
description: A co-operative effort between the Berlin publisher Averse Publications and Broken Spine Productions, The Shape of Snakes is a poetic portrayal of a burgeoning relationship, combining sensuality and sometimes arcane theology with the thrills and uncertainties of first love, all couched within a conflation of creation myths from the Judeo-Christian tradition, Norse and Mesopotamian mythology, and Aztec and Druidic ritual and symbology.

name: Aidan Baker - Only Stories (LP)
description: Only Stories continues with the 'drone folk' style established on Scalpel, simple, spare songs with quiet vocals and minimal background drones, all sounds produced by 6- and 12-string guitars. A co-operative release between Broken Spine and The Kora Records, Only Stories comes in a folding, letterpressed sleeve custom designed by The Kora Records. Comes with a digital download card or the album is available digitally here (with an extra track that didn't fit on the vinyl).
